process.name: LorArcGrid Interface
process.narrative:
Interface for the LorArcGrid Silverlight Grid Control.
Attach this to the browser containing the control, and then the relevant actions can be used to interact with the content of the grid as desired.

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Clean Up Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some finalisation (or "cleanup") tasks as your business object is closed down.
The cleanup action will be called automatically immediately after closing your business object at the end of a business process.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than before the disposal of the business object.

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Initialise Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some initialisation tasks after your business object is loaded.
The initialise action will be called automatically immediately after loading your business object.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than after the creation of the object.

stage.name: Get Row Count
stage.narrative: Get the total number of rows in the grid.

output.name: Row Count
output.narrative: Number of rows in the grid

stage.name: code
Library
GetValue
stage.narrative: Get the value from a given row and column.

input.name: Column Name
input.narrative: The name of the column, e.g. "Patient ID"

stage.name: code
FindFirstRowByColumnValue
stage.narrative: Get the row index of the first row where the given column contains the given value. Returns -1 if no matching row was found.

input.name: Exact
input.narrative: If False, comparison is case-insensitive and ignores leading/trailing whitespace

output.name: Row
output.narrative: Matching row index, or -1 if none

stage.name: code
code
code
Get Columns
stage.narrative: Get details of all columns in the grid.

stage.name: code
